content.rendered:
Embellish daily use articles:

Fabric Glue can be used to embellish articles that one uses on a daily basis for eg: garments, bags, footwear, accessories etc. It enhances the articles and gives it a whole new look altogether.

Multiple Applications:

Various materials ( stones, patches, beads, sequence, lace, ribbon, mirror-work, foil, cord and seams) can be stuck to your fabric by using fabric glue thereby rendering the intricacy of the design/pattern and giving it a delicate and ornate look.

Permanent Bond Strength:

The bond strength of Fabric Glue is everlasting. It very easily sticks different materials on to the surface of the article with little pressure for about 10 seconds. If allowed to dry for 24 hours, the materials are bound to the surface permanently.

Transparent on Drying:

This product can be used on various surfaces without hesitation as the glue turns transparent once it dries. This also makes it possible for one to use the glue on a net fabric and not be worried about glue stains

excerpt.rendered:
Fevicryl Fabric Glue replaces stitching with sticking, available in a 80gm capacity

Ideal for sticking beads, sequins, lace, ribbon, applique, foil, mirror work, glitter dust, cords and seams to fabric

Fabric Glue dries clear, allow it to dry for 24 hours before use 5) Wash the fabric only after 7 days

Gentle machine wash is suitable

Iron on the reverse side for durability
